name: God's Domain
description:
God's Domain is a massively multiplayer virtual reality open world game made to give people a separate reality to escape their lives to.The game is full of fantasy elements and it is a great place to go have fun with your friends and family while you level up your character, obtain new skills, discover new races and classes and explore the virtual world.

Features:

-Online PvP & Co-op gameplay-
Defeat other players for rewards or work together to slay enemies and bosses.

-Quest Lines-
Help the denizens of God's Domain to accomplish tasks and save the world from the darkness that seeks to overrun the land.

-Crafting-
Obtain crafting materials to create new items and equipment.

-Monsters & Bosses-
Defeat groups of enemies to level up and gain skill points and learn new skills. Boss monsters lie in wait in the far reaches of special areas. Defeating these boss monsters unlocks new areas and gives special rewards.

-Mini Games-
Play carnival games against players or alone to win prizes and other special rewards.
